title.narrative: Amplify VoicesFemme et Tic and Kunafoni

description.narrative: The Women and ICT in Consortium with Kunafoni is the facilitator of Link and learning component Voice in Mali for 3 years. Link and learning is the heart and soul of Voice. Through this component, we stimulate collaboration, listening, learning, documentation, innovation and the application of new knowledge among rightsholders and more broadly with communities and stakeholders. The objectiveof the Link and learning component project is to amplify in an innovative and inclusive way the voices of the many rightsholders through capacity building, lobbying, awareness-raising, empowerment, advocacy, denunciations, among others; but also to share through documentation, linkages and learning. The consortium has put ightsholders groups at the heart of the implementation of Voice activities and facilitates the development of communities of practice around issues and challenges that affect them. They are developing a platform to promote inclusive collaboration, including for communities in other regions of Mali. The consortium organizes innovativeevents and meetings to amplify the voices of rights holders at the local, regional, national and international levels, supported bythe production of documents and shareable visuals to deepen learning. Several innovates activities will take in place including : “Handicapable” Festival (1st and 2nd edition), Kunafoni Show-time, communities of practice and stakeholders, publication online anddissemination of 6 rapped debates, Five Dial-in Conferencing, production of two documents in drawings defending the position of VOICE grant partner groups and many other inclusive activities. During the implementation of the Linking and Learning component project, inclusion, respect for personal data and the authorization of participation of people and resources will be done through formal frameworks, to value information that can serve as inspiration for some and as life lessons for others. For sharing and exchanging experiences and information are the keys to success that will weave links towards innovation and learning, especially in the VOICE program in Mali.

participating-org.narrative: Consortuim Femme et Tic et Kunafoni

The association "Women and ICT" and the web TV "KUNAFONI" are two non-profit organizations that work on the women and young people rights , especially marginalized, living with disabilities, victims of abuse, discrimination and or violence. The expertise of "Women and ICTs" is using information and/or the learning lesson in an attractive and innovative way while facilitating its access to the targets, hence the interest of facilitating the link and learning through ICTS. We propose innovative interactive and collaborative solutions that can be adapted to the realities of Mali and that facilitate meetings and ensure better feedback and evaluation of projects. The Association "Women and ICTs" is specialized in the production of digital content andpaper works (books, newspapers, brochures, etc...) through the use of ICTs to promote a better understanding and accessibility of information, especially sensitive information. "KUNAFONI.COM" is a social enterprise that works in the field of human rights through events, information and awareness in the media. It distinguishes itself from other actors through its innovative activities such as the rapped debate, the "Kunafoni Show Time" and wide media coverage in the press (print, radio, TV and online).

description.narrative: Grantees, rightsholder groups and other key stakeholders develop and implement innovative strategies to reach, empower and strengthen the capacities of rightsholders.
# Communities of Practice supported by programme staff and Linking and Learning facilitating organisations to define a set of learning questions

comment.narrative: Nous avons réalisées 2 CoP sur la période de rapportage. Les notions que suestions d'apprentisssages sont discutées et expliquées lors des communautés de pratiques. Et tous les partenaires sont invités à élaborer les questions d'apprentissage dans la mise en œuvre de leur projet,
